mapper.select:
select * from ${array[0]} AS D, DEVICE_MODE AS M, SENSOR_DEVICE_INFOS AS SDI, ${array[1]} AS S,
(select MAX(_timestamp) AS last_update, device_id from ${array[0]} GROUP BY device_id) as DT,
(select MAX(_timestamp) AS last_sensor_update, device_id from ${array[1]} GROUP BY device_id) as ST
WHERE D.device_id = DT.device_id AND D._timestamp = DT.last_update AND S.device_id = ST.device_id AND S._timestamp = ST.last_sensor_update AND D.device_id = M.device_id AND D.device_id = SDI.device_id AND SDI.sensor_id = S.device_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SENSOR_TEMP SELECT subtable._timestamp, subtable.device_id, avg(subtable.temp_value), avg(subtable.humid_value), 1 AS grouped FROM ( SELECT CONCAT( DATE(_timestamp), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(_timestamp) DIV ${array[1]}) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s') ) as _timestamp, device_id, temp_value, humid_value FROM SENSOR_TEMP WHERE grouped = 0 and _timestamp < CONCAT( DATE(#{array[0]}), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(#{array[0]}) DIV ${array[1]}) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s')) ) AS subtable GROUP BY _timestamp, device_id;

INSERT INTO SENSOR_LIGHT SELECT subtable._timestamp, subtable.device_id, avg(subtable.light_value), 1 AS grouped FROM ( SELECT CONCAT( DATE(_timestamp), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(_timestamp) DIV ${array[1]} ) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s') ) as _timestamp, device_id, light_value FROM SENSOR_LIGHT WHERE grouped = 0 and _timestamp < CONCAT( DATE(#{array[0]}), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(#{array[0]}) DIV ${array[1]}) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s')) ) AS subtable GROUP BY _timestamp, device_id;

INSERT INTO SENSOR_PLANT SELECT subtable._timestamp, subtable.device_id, avg(subtable.humid_value), 1 AS grouped FROM ( SELECT CONCAT( DATE(_timestamp), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(_timestamp) DIV ${array[1]}) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s') ) as _timestamp, device_id, humid_value FROM SENSOR_PLANT WHERE grouped = 0 and _timestamp < CONCAT( DATE(#{array[0]}), " ", TIME_FORMAT( SEC_TO_TIME( (TIME_TO_SEC(#{array[0]}) DIV ${array[1]}) * ${array[1]} ), '%H:%i:%s')) ) AS subtable GROUP BY _timestamp, device_id;
